title: Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules
content: Special Departmental Rule I is hereby amended by adding to the list of places excepted from examination in the Treasury Department--
In the Bureau of Immigration: One statistician and stenographer, with power to act as immigrant inspector.
citation: Grover Cleveland, Executive Order-Amendment of Civil Service Rules Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/206597
